    Classes in org.springframework.boot.test.autoconfigure.jdbc with annotations of type PropertyMapping
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    @interface 
    AutoConfigureTestDatabase
    Annotation that can be applied to a test class to configure a test database to use instead of the application-defined or auto-configured DataSource.

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    @interface 
    AutoConfigureMockRestServiceServer

    AutoConfigureWebClient

    AutoConfigureWebTestClient
